text: @CurtisHouck @PressSec @kayleighmcenany @newsbusters Protests are outdoors, with masks, and mostly, social distancing. Indoor rallies, no masks, are a coronavirus spreader. The Corona Virus Task Force recommended against this. #ScienceMatters
